mdRecord.dcterms:title: Archaeologist measures the elevation of brick feature uncovered during the excavation of Mews Alley for the laying of pipe conduit
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mews Alley runs from McCormick Road on the west to the Lawn, between Hotels A and B and Pavilions I and III. The project was to repair water lines to Pavilion I. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
